stories.text: Along the lines of "Education is not the filling of a pail, ...", are there videos that show great teachers introducing a field & its concepts to students in exemplary ways?  Particularly elementary school through high school.

stories.text:
For years that I hear about new developments in batteries but the feeling I got is that everything is pretty much the same: bigger batteries and more efficient CPUs/systems/hardware are making the difference, not the battery itself.

If I do a quick search, I find articles making reference to technologies like graphene, next-generation lithium or charges in 5 minutes, but I just donâ€™t see real applications of all of these. Am I missing something?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are Batteries Not Evolving?
